results.title: Simvastatin reduces wasting and improves cardiac function as well as outcome in experimental cancer cachexia.
results.text_hl: This was mainly due to reduced @<m>DISEASE_Thinness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013851 @@@atrophy of lean@@@ mass, i.e. muscle mass.

citations.NLM: Palus S, von Haehling S, Flach VC, Tschirner A, Doehner W, Anker SD, Springer J. Simvastatin reduces wasting and improves cardiac function as well as outcome in experimental cancer cachexia. Int J Cardiol. 2013 Oct 9;168(4):3412-8. PMID: 23680591
